text: No one's been like Rhobb, such a King Pin like Rhobb..
With a single swipe Rhobb breaks both tree and rock.
His secret? About fourty gallons a day.
Revered amongst Slayers, Rhobb wears his token with pride.
Thulgrim may snatch your belongings before you even shout ''Thief!''.
''Oh this? No this was all acquired.. Legitimately''.
It's not the size of the sword that counts, it's how you wield it.
Is it shiny? Is it valueable? Thulgrim'll take it.
None as stout and brave as the one and only Ensun, slayer of foul.
A source of inspiration for all maids, Ensun's name is carried with awe.
The finest mail gifted by one of her many suitors.
The strongest of Runesmiths woe her with runes of old.
Obtained on one of her many adventures, her weaponry ooze exotic powers.
Those undefeated by men better watch out..
''Here, take another! The drunker you are the easier to rob''.
Time is money, and money is time.
Armour? Who requires armour if you bolster a torso as fine as Rhobb's.
With force and strength Rhobb smites his foes like ragdolls.
There are but few dwarves that have the sheer strength to lift Rhobb's axe, even fewer to tale the tale after they had to parry it.
Battle? What a waste of time better spent thieving somewhere else.
Dwarves eagerly follow Ensun in to battle, and anywhere else quite frankly.
